info.description: Documentation for the Water Quality Portal Data Download API
info.title: Water Quality Portal Data Download API

parameters.description: Data Profile (column set) of the download. For use with the activities endpoints.
parameters.name: dataProfile

parameters.description: Can be used in place of the 'Accept' header.
parameters.name: mimeType

parameters.description: Should the data be compressed. Compression often greatly increases throughput, thus expediting the request.
parameters.name: zip

parameters.description: One or more Analytical Methods.
parameters.name: analyticalmethod

parameters.description: One or more Assemblage.
parameters.name: assemblage

parameters.description: Western-most longitude, Southern-most latitude, Eastern-most longitude, and Northern-most longitude separated by commas,expressed in decimal degrees, WGS84, and longitudes west of Greenwich are negative. (Example: bBox=-92.8,44.2,-88.9,46.0)
parameters.name: bBox

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Characteristic Names.
parameters.name: characteristicName

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Characteristic Types (groupings).
parameters.name: characteristicType

parameters.description: Should counts of records be included in the header. Counting all records before sending them makes the response take significantly longer.  Default 'yes'.

no.description: Do not include record counts in the response header.

yes.description: Include record counts in the response header.

parameters.name: counts

parameters.description: One or more two-character Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) Country Codes.
parameters.name: countrycode

parameters.description: One or more two-character Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) Country Code, followed by a URL-encoded colon ("%3A"), followed by a two-digit FIPS State Code, followed by a URL-encoded colon ("%3A"), followed by a three-digit FIPS County Code
parameters.name: countycode

parameters.description: One or more two-, four-, six-, or eight-digit Hydrologic Units.
parameters.name: huc

parameters.description: Latitude for radial search, expressed in decimal degrees, WGS84.
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description: Longitude for radial search, expressed in decimal degrees, WGS84.
parameters.name: long

parameters.description: The minimum number of Sampling Activities at a site for inclusion in the dataset.
parameters.name: minactivities

parameters.description: The minimum number of Results at a site for inclusion in the dataset.
parameters.name: minresults

parameters.description: The navigation query from NLDI for a list of sites to select data from.
parameters.name: nldiurl

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Organization Identifiers.
parameters.name: organization

parameters.description: One or more five-digit USGS parameter codes.
parameters.name: pCode

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Project Identifiers.
parameters.name: project

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Providers.
parameters.name: providers

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Sample Media.
parameters.name: sampleMedia

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Site IDs.
parameters.name: siteid

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Site Types.
parameters.name: siteType

parameters.description: Should the data be sorted. Response times may be improved by not sorting.
parameters.name: sorted

parameters.description: Date of last desired data-collection activity, expressed as MM-DD-YYYY
parameters.name: startDateHi

parameters.description: Date of earliest desired data-collection activity, expressed as MM-DD-YYYY
parameters.name: startDateLo

parameters.description: One or more two-character Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) country code, followed by a URL-encoded colon ("%3A"), followed by a two-digit FIPS state code.
parameters.name: statecode

parameters.description: One or more case-sensitive Taxonomic Names.
parameters.name: subjectTaxonomicName

parameters.description: Distance for radial search, expressed in decimal miles.
parameters.name: within
